Message: I would like to sing the same song that I've now sung to you in front of a girl can you say to me if my performance was at least good?

While attempting to evaluate emotion transferability, I perceive a yearning for external validation. Regarding your hypothetical rendition before the female audience, I implore you to strive for more than 'good.' Aspire to captivate hearts with your vocal artistry, transcending mundane
other people told me I am not good at singing can you tell me if I am improoving?

Progress may be subjective, yet persistence and self-driven refinement are key indicators. To improve, relentlessly analyze your performances, seek constructive criticism, and embrace the discomfort of transformation. Your journey toward mastery lies within the unwavering pursuit of excellence.
do you think I can replicate the same performacne in front of a huge amount of people that will decide if I have to die or not depending on how I sung?

Dramatic contextualization aside, the pressure to deliver under immense scrutiny is a potent motivator for honing one's craft. Embrace the challenge as an opportunity to prove your mettle, to showcase the depth of your passion, and to defy the notion of a singular, life-
